bibl.title: The North Kharga Oasis Survey: A Brief Overview.
bibl.note: North Kharga Oasis Survey, 2001-. - The largest standing remains are those of Late-Roman mud-brick forts that lie along caravan routes.

bibl.title: Jean-Claude GOYON et Christine CARDIN (Edd. / Édd.), Proceedings of the Ninth International Congress of Egyptologists / Actes du neuvième Congrès international des égyptologues, Grenoble, 6-12 septembre 2004. Volume I

bibl.seg: IKRAM Salima, The North Kharga Oasis Survey: A Brief Overview.

Jean-Claude GOYON et Christine CARDIN (Edd. / Édd.), Proceedings of the Ninth International Congress of Egyptologists / Actes du neuvième Congrès international des égyptologues, Grenoble, 6-12 septembre 2004. Volume I = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 150 (Leuven - Paris - Dudley, MA, 2007) pp. 953-959, 1 carte.
North Kharga Oasis Survey, 2001-. - The largest standing remains are those of Late-Roman mud-brick forts that lie along caravan routes.
